title: 服务器玩家不能升级
author: wjt12321
txt_content:
服务器玩家突然不能升级了(包括op)，获得经验后经验条只是闪一下，然后经验就归零。
最近也没安装什么插件，求助到底是哪里出了问题。

replies.author: aibai
replies.txt_content: 会不会哪个OP在哪扔了个高频然后(/exp set @a 0)呢?_(:X」∠)_

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
获得经验后，后台有没有刷东西？
然后输入/plugins并截图

replies.author: wjt12321
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-9-24 17:09
获得经验后，后台有没有刷东西？
然后输入/plugins并截图
获取经验后，后台并没有刷什么...

Plugins (43): Ships, ChairStairs, WorldBorder, ResidenceAssist, NoSpawnChunks, GroupManager, BreedingLimiter, WorldEdit, Credit, GeneralDataCore, Vault, BarAPI, LWC, TreeAssist, HypeAnnouncer, AntiBoneDustBug, ItemLoreStats, AutoMessage, Animation, SQLibrary, CoreProtect, ChestCommands, ClearLag, ProtocolLib, NeverLag, BanItem, Essentials, QuickShop, SignIn, EssentialsProtect, ServerSigns, EssentialsSpawn, PlotMe, Multiverse-Core, EssentialsAntiBuild, AuthMe, EssentialsChat, HolographicDisplays, ColorMOTD, Residence, NovaGuilds, RPG_Items, GreatFireWall

replies.author: wjt12321
replies.txt_content:
baibai 发表于 2016-9-24 17:01
会不会哪个OP在哪扔了个高频然后(/exp set @a 0)呢?_(:X」∠)_
应该不是...因为可以获得小于17点经验，但就是不能升级，经验超过17点直接清零

replies.author: aibai
replies.txt_content:
wjt12321 发表于 2016-9-24 17:26
应该不是...因为可以获得小于17点经验，但就是不能升级，经验超过17点直接清零 ...
那会不会什么插件出错了或者配置弄错之类的呢_(:X」∠)_

replies.author: wjt12321
replies.txt_content:
baibai 发表于 2016-9-24 18:41
那会不会什么插件出错了或者配置弄错之类的呢_(:X」∠)_
并不像插件的错误乁( ˙ω˙ )厂
